subject: 洞穴内部的奇幻景象
detail: Animated fantasy style, inside a mystical cave glowing with bioluminescent crystals embedded in the walls, floating luminous orbs drifting gently through the air, tiny fairies exploring curiously among glowing fluorescent moss on the floor and ancient glowing runes carved into the stone walls; first revealing the shimmering crystals, then the light orbs rising and swirling slowly, next the fairies fluttering and interacting with the environment, finally widening slightly to reveal the full enchanted cavern — Dolly in smoothly; background sound: echoing whispers and soft ambient cave reverberation. Voiceover says in Chinese "洞穴里藏着无数奇幻的景象"
image_detail: (动画风格) 洞穴内部有发光水晶和漂浮的光球，地面覆盖着荧光苔藓，墙壁上刻有古老符文
narration: 洞穴里藏着无数奇幻的景象
